(ARC-TI)[SGT, INC] 2015-03-11T16:41:04+00:00 2015-03-11T16:41:04+00:00 [fm-announcements] Fifth Summer School on Formal Techniques, CA https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CABERNET-EVENTS;8405a235.1503 Fifth Summer School on Formal Techniques, May 17 - May 22, 2015, Atherton, California<br>http://fm.csl.sri.com/SSFT15<br><br>Techniques based on formal logic, such as model checking, satisfiability, static<br>analysis, and automated theorem proving, are finding a broad range of applications<br>in modeling, analysis, verification, and synthesis. This school, the fifth in the<br>series, will focus on the principles and practice of formal techniques, with a<br>strong emphasis on the hands-on use and development of this technology. It<br>primarily targets graduate students and young researchers who are interested in<br>studying and using formal techniques in their research.
